fields.label: Use Vimeo File Link (recommended)
fields.name: vimeo_file_link
fields.instructions:
Use this for best performance and mobile video not needed
</br>
for example, https://vimeo.com/manage/405846877/distribution#video-file-links

fields.label: Hero Background Vimeo ID (mobile)
fields.name: post_hero_background_video_mobile
fields.instructions: 9 x 16 ratio, vertical for phones. example: 5777280 https://vimeo.com/5777280

fields.label: Hero Background Vimeo File Link Mobile
fields.name: hero_background_vimeo_file_link_mobile

fields.label: Hero Overlay Bottom
fields.name: hero_overlay_bottom
fields.instructions: tip: be sure hero background image is set with an image and hero is set to full-height

fields.label: Overlay Opacity
fields.name: overlay_opacity
fields.instructions: Adds and overlay to background image to help with ADA compliance.

fields.label: Thumbnail Background Color
fields.name: thumbnail_background_color
fields.instructions: Adds background color for thumbnails in menu and grid layouts.

sub_fields.label: Link External
sub_fields.name: link_external
sub_fields.instructions: use https:// or http:// or relative path for archive pages ie /listings

fields.label: Hero Background Bottom Image
fields.name: post_hero_background_bottom
fields.instructions: Will crop image automatically to the 16 x 9 ratio.

sub_fields.label: Link External
sub_fields.name: link_external
sub_fields.instructions: use https:// or http:// or relative path for archive pages ie /listings
